datastructures

Class BinaryHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.BinaryHeap

  • public class BinaryHeap
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryHeap(int arraySize)
      Initializes a new empty array.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Removes the minimum value.

      Checks if the array is empty.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryHeap

        public BinaryHeap(int arraySize)
        Initializes a new empty array.
        Parameters:
        arraySize - size of the array - how many elements the array can contain.

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(int x)
        Inserts value to the heap. It does this by putting the value in after the arrays last value. Then it heaps it up until the heap property is restored.
        Parameters:
        x - int that is being inserted.

      • findMin

        public int findMin()
        Finds the minimum value in the array.
        Returns:
        if the array is not empty, it returns the value of minimum value which is at the root. If the array is empty, it returns null.

      • deleteMin

        public int deleteMin()
        Removes the minimum value. It does this by extracting the root, then moving the last value in to the roots place and then heaping it down until the heap property is restored.
        Returns:
        the minimum value value as int.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the array is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the array is empty, false otherwise.

      • siftUp

        public void siftUp(int index)
        Method that moves the value recursively up the tree until the heap property is restored.
        Parameters:
        index - place where the value that is being moved is at.

      • siftDown

        public void siftDown(int index)
        Method that moves the value down in the tree until the heap property is restored.
        Parameters:
        index - place where the value that is being moved is at.

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the size of the array.
        Returns:
        number of elements that the array contains as int.
